title: Code Black: Hayabiki no Lelouch
original_name: コードブラック 速弾きのルルーシュ
sinopse: This spin-off of Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch revolves around Lelouch, who, although has zero knowledge of music, is forced to become the vocalist and guitarist for a band at the school culture festival. Beyond this, a cruel destiny awaits.
